team.name: tier1-team-01
resource_msg:
**Your Team Project:**
 All Tier 1 teams will be building the **_Expense Splitter_** app to help you split expenses for events with family and friends. All teams are required to create this same application from these [requirements & specifications](https://github.com/chingu-voyages/voyage-project-tier1-expensesplitter).

team.name: tier3-team-30
resource_msg:
**Your Team Project:**
 As a Tier 3 team your team has the choice of building the **_Expense Splitter_** app to help you split expenses for events with family and friends **OR** creating an app of your own design. If you choose to implement Expense Splitter here are the [requirements & specifications](https://github.com/chingu-voyages/voyage-project-tier3-expensesplitter). 

 If you choose to create your own you'll want to start by working together to choose a project theme, create a vision statement, and then build a prioritized list of user features.

This will give you what you need to build the Project Backlog you'll be following to design, build, test, & deploy it.

team_greeting1:
:rocket: **_Congratulations Voyagers!_** You found your team chat! Read carefully below so you don't miss out on getting a good start.

**__Your First Steps__** 
1. Say "hi" to your team-mates! Come in excited and help welcome your teammates! I will list everyone on the team after this message so you can know exactly who is on your team. Note: @jim_medlock, Chingu-X bot, & the other Admins are not your teammates. :slight_smile:
2. **_Copy_** the intro you added in https://discord.com/channels/330284646283608064/553103063649353738 when you joined Chingu and **_paste it here_** to let your teammates get to know you!
3. Follow the steps in the [Voyage Guide](https://github.com/chingu-voyages/Handbook/blob/main/docs/guides/voyage/voyage.md#voyage-guide) we emailed last week to set a solid foundation for your project. The most important step to concentrate on is scheduling your Team Kickoff meeting as soon as possible.

**__In your first Sprint you should concentrate on completing these tasks:__**
1. Meet your team & schedule kickoff meeting
2. Conduct kickoff meeting
3. Choose a project (Tier 3 only)
4. create a Vision Statement  & define & prioritize MVP features

**__How can we communicate & collaborate with one another?__**
- We've created a simple and easy way to create a voice/video channel for team meetings, one-on-one discussions, & troubleshooting sessions whenever you need them! Check out the `How do I make a voice channel for my team?` section in the Voyage Guide.
- You can find out more about each of these in the [Voyage Guide](https://github.com/chingu-voyages/Handbook/blob/main/docs/guides/voyage/voyage.md#voyage-guide).

**__How can I get the attention of my teammates?__**
You should use <@&1104544072347160578> to send a message to all teammates instead of using `@everyone`.
team_greeting2:
**__Finally__**
Stay committed to your Voyage goal and active with your team! Don't forget what you agreed to in the Commitment Form. Remember that the #1 factor to success isn't technology - it's **_daily_** communication & collaboration with your teammates.
